website_summaries.verdict: This short obstacle course is a perfect starter kit for beginners who want to learn.
pros: High-quality monkey bars, rings, and swinging knots
Mix and match the order to create new obstacles courses to constantly challenge your kids
cons: It may be too short and limiting for older kids who have mastered such courses in the past

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for our unfinished basement for our kids in the winter time. We did not sure the ratchet system (we will save that for summer outdoors) the equipment is very strong. holds an adult of 175 no problem. We used swing set chains around our floor trusses to hang the equipment. very very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Strong, popular with kids
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I was able to get it put up with no help from the hubby and it was secure. Kids loved playing on it this summer. I had trouble releasing the ratchet, but that was my fault because I never use ratchet straps for anything and YouTube was not helpful. The manufacturer responded to an email right away and they were very helpful. I’m looking forward to seeing additional accessories offered by this company. Only issue we had was two kids with varying heights and abilities, you kind of have to chose which kid is going to use it most. Not a problem if you take down regularly, but I left it up for months.
customer_reviews.author: Melbee

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great start to our ninja backyard.
customer_reviews.text: Great start to our ninja backyard. Doesn't damage trees, easy to install with a little forethought about where you want the handholds to be located.
customer_reviews.author: SeabeeMom

customer_reviews.title: High quality and fun
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality. Very strong and capable. I really wasn’t expecting it to be so heavy duty. Bought for my seven and nine year old kids. We like watching a certain tv show on another network - this is a fun way for kids to live the show.
customer_reviews.author: toobig4u

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for the back yard, cabin, or church group
customer_reviews.text: My Kids wanted to play the moment it arrived and this product had them laughing and swinging until it was time to get ready for bed. I appreciated the step by step instructions guide to get it set up. While I did this, the kids decided on the order of obstacles for me to hang. I plan to get a few more... One for the cabin, another for youth group, and of course an easy Christmas gift exchange idea!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fun for all the kids..young and not so young
customer_reviews.text: Great product that arrived with all the parts and just as described. A great value for outdoor exercise and fun. A ninja obsolete course for all the family with monkey bars, rings and knots. This product has a higher weight limit then some other similar products. Tree friendly. What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Electroman

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy which makes me feel it is safe for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! So glad I purchased this. It is such high quality, sturdy, and very easy to assemble. I even live the color. My 4 year old grandson loves it! We had a family cookout, and it kept all the kids entertained for hours! I contacted the company with a question and they responded immediately with an answer. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Broke first try
customer_reviews.text: We set it up. Tested it. Then my 10 year old daughter tried it and the first time she tried it one of the metal pieces that held the obstacles broke and she fell to the ground. She won’t go on it now. So sad. My kids were so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: This didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: We strapped this to two trees and looked forward to our grandson loving this. He found it difficult to navigate. Most importantly, I was not able to contact the seller to attempt a return, despite being only four days out of the return policy limit. COVID-19 had us buy this, and COVID-19 might have made returning this a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my kids who are obsessed with monkey bars and more. I don't have two strong tress where i can install it, and my 6 yo gets to bend my tree so we are not quite using it. But for a couple weeks it was all they did
customer_reviews.author: Julieta vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old little brother and he LOVES it! We put it up in the backyard and he continues to make different courses from changing the attachments and has me time him whenever I'm around. I've even taken a few turns on it and it has been quite steady, I weigh 185lbs. Overall a great present and reason to get him outside and active.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kids love hanging around on the jungle highland obstacle course. The maker of Jungle Highline, Harbor Creations, has been amazing in helping me with ordering additional attachments and for helping me replace an item that got broke accidentally by my lawn service. At a time when there's much demand for outdoor toys, this company has been great at customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great Slackline
customer_reviews.text: We found this easy to assemble and were happy with the amount of accessories it came with. Both of my children love it and play on it on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: jojototo

customer_reviews.title: It sags even when cranked tight
customer_reviews.text: We can't crank it tight enough to keep it from sagging badly in the middle under the weight of a small child. By the time she gets to the middle of the line her toes are dragging the ground.
customer_reviews.author: fivespace

customer_reviews.title: Junior Ninja fun
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves pretending to be junior ninja. He creates ground level obstacles as well as using the rings and bars for upper level play.
customer_reviews.author: noahsfrugalmom

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and rest of kids loves it. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneB

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Everything is made of high quality materials and was very easy to set up. My kids are 4 and 6 and it’s a bit too challenging for them, but they can grow into it. Will be easy to travel with as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Rating woes
customer_reviews.text: Dont like eating things I dont have. It was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Baker

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been up all summer and the kids use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harding

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 granddaughters, a little difficult but we like the fact that you can move the obstacles when you want them closer or further apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the adventurous kid
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves his new 'ninja warrior' obstacle course. Great for kids. Must have two trees near each other to attach.
customer_reviews.author: anna schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! Took me 15 minutes to set up. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Laxton

customer_reviews.title: Great Zipline Kit
customer_reviews.text: This came with everything we needed and more (wasn't expecting the bag to store the obstacles in or the ratchet cover). Very nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: This obstacle course is a hit in our house! My 9 yr old uses it daily and his friends always enjoy it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Everidge

customer_reviews.title: Good course
customer_reviews.text: Great adventure kit but the buckle/set up was a bit time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great to get kids active
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kid who is as obsessed with American Ninja Warrior as mine is!
customer_reviews.author: GINGER M.

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and move. Very portable perfect floor camping activities too!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kyriakides-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Easy set up - hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ac1979

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy, easy to assemble and SO MUCH FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 boys, ages 5 and 8. They got this jungle line for Christmas and it has been a total hit!! I was able to put it up by myself, with ease. The directions are clear and very helpful in deciding where to place each item on the line. I really like that we can easily move the items around based on what the boys want, but it is safe enough to where they cannot do it themselves. This is an item I trust holding my children and myself! We have had so much fun and look forward to many more years with this activity in our yard!! Will absolutely be buying any other items available to add!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Foster

product_meta.title: Jungle Highline Kids Obstacle Course | Extreme Ninja Obstacle Course | 7 Obstacles Including Monkey Bars, Swinging Rings, and Monkey Knots Kit | Designed in The USA
product_meta.description:
Fun & Engaging Obstacle Course for Everyone 
Mom’s and dad’s love having the Jungle Highline obstacle course in their backyard for their kids. With this adventure kit, you will know where your kids and their friends are playing — swinging on the ninja-like obstacle course close to home. Set up the ropes, rings, and monkey bars to keep your children active and having fun for hours. Be the center of excitement on your block with the new Jungle Highline Obstacle Course 

Optimal Length & Size 
The Jungle Highline Obstacle Course is designed to be the ideal length that provide the best usage and activity for kids. Longer slackline courses sag too much to be able to used effectively, but the length of our course was specifically chosen to ensure a fun and enjoyable experience for kids 5 years old an up each and every time. 

Double Stitched and Wrapped for Strength and Durability Have confidence this course is built with strength and quality in mind — guaranteed. The slackline is stitched with high strength material to support up to 250 lbs. for extended use. Have peace of mind your kids are playing on a strong, quality product that will support any obstacles they try to cross. 

Design the Course Exactly how You Want! This course can be tailor for the specific use any age or skill-level. Quickly change the difficulty by adjusting the obstacle spacing or order to make the course easier or harder for different skill levels. For additionally variation, set the slackline on an angle to provide a new and challenging experience as climbers progress. 

Superb Gift for the Promote Activity, Holidays, and Birthdays 
Everyone wants to give a gift that family and friends will use and love. Rest assured, the Jungle Highline Obstacle Course checks all the boxes! With everything included and easy to understand instruction, the course can be set up quickly and fun times enjoyed immediately!
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY: At Harbor Creations, we designed the 36ft Jungle Highline kit with a focus on kid’s safety. Our obstacles are larger and the ratchets are thicker to provide a more secure highline-experience. You are guaranteed to get TOP QUALITY with the Jungle Highline kit.

UNIQUE OBSTACLES: The kit provides a fun experience that challenges kids while helping them grow. The kit includes Two (2) Monkey bars, Two (2) Swinging Rings, Three (3) Monkey knots along with the lines, ratchet, and tree protectors you need to create your own unique swinging experience

CUSTOMIZABLE COURSE: This product includes everything you need to get started! The highline comes with 10 loops to attach the included obstacles with plenty of room to add more. Change the order and spacing of obstacles to create new courses and challenges that keep kids active and engaged.

MULTIPLE SKILL LEVELS: Whether you are starting out, or are a master of the jungle, the course can be set up in multiple configurations for multiple skillsets. By adjusting the spacing and incline of the line, you will have countless setups to challenge all skill levels
GREAT GIFT: Keep kids active and playing outside with this great ropes course that can be taken anywhere - camping, neighbor’s house, parties, or your own backyard.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
